Detailed Description

template<class T> template class XVImageScalar

Defines an image with scalar operations.

Image class where each pixel is represented by a scalar type, such as u_char, u_short, int, float or double. The class is inherited from XVImageBase, and has some additional arithmetic operators, plus write_pgm and read_pgm for input and output of greyscale images in .pgm files;
